General.Name: Zodiac Clothing Company Limited
General.Description: Zodiac Clothing Company Limited engages in the manufacturing, retailing, and trading of men's clothing and accessories in India and internationally. It provides shirts, ties, trousers, suits, lounge wear, and polos, as well as accessories, including belts, cufflinks, socks, handkerchiefs, masks, and pochettes. The company offers its products under the Zodiac, Zod, and Z3 brands. As of March 31, 2022, it operated 96 stores. Zodiac Clothing Company Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Mumbai, India.
